website_summaries.verdict: If you have a stable home Wi-Fi connection and want more control over your slow-cooked meals, Belkin and Jarden's Crock-Pot WeMo Smart Slow Cooker can give you the on-the-go access you crave. For everyone else, it's an overpriced slow cooker that makes a hands-off process much more involved.
pros: You can monitor and adjust the $130 Crock-Pot WeMo Smart Slow Cooker's timer and heat settings straight from the Belkin WeMo app
It makes a mean pot roast, too
cons: This slow cooker can't tell the difference between a Wi-Fi outage and a power outage, so spotty home Wi-Fi might return frequent error messages and cause you to question whether your food is safe to eat

customer_reviews.title: Great! But the app 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can turn it on and off on the app while at work or out and about. Be prepared to spend a longtime syncing the crockpot to the Wemo App. The WEMO App is not good, needs a serious upgrade and tweaking. Also on the app you can set the schedule for cooking but it does not turn off or shut off at the scheduled time, it stays on warm. So you need to setup an extra timer to remind your self to shut it off. Learned my lesson by cooking chicken all night long. Giving 4 stars because of the time it took to sync it to the WEMO app and the cooking time feature.
customer_reviews.author: Berto M.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase I've made in a long time. I love new technology but this simply doesn't work properly. Get used to seeing the light not green. If you like waking up to a crockpot of food that's stopped cooking during the night then this will work for you. Had already reset it up and that took too long to research. That's the reason I had to set it to cook all night, because it got late. I'm cutting my losses for the two pounds of meat and returning this horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful appliance
customer_reviews.text: I have had none of the connectivity issues that others describe. Setup was easy and worked after a firmware update. The other day, I had completely forgotten my slow cooker dish when I met friends for drinks. My phone notified me when the slow cooker was done, and it automatically put the setting on warm. Very much enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Theocritus

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this crockpot!! I have gone through 3 different ones to try to find one that will actually connect to either my phone or my husbands (iPhone 8 and iPhoneX). We followed all of the directions, tried every YouTube video hack, and even called customer service. I just returned my third one today and throwing in the towel on this one. Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Great Slow Cooker, horrible WeMo app\connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Slow cooker itself is great, WiFI connection is great as well (no disconnects) As noted in many other review and on Belkin forums, remote connectivity is broken via WeMo app (it worked about 5% of the time for me). I ended up using it with Home Assistant and writing custom code for the integration - works flawlessly now (including remote control) via Home Assistant but this is certainly not something a consumer should have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Alexandrov

customer_reviews.title: Loses connection to wifi
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it works. But out of about 5 uses, it hasn't connected to the wifi 3 of those times. The primary function of this crockpot is the wifi functionality. Without being able to connect to the wifi the majority of the time, this is just an overpriced crockpot. Have tried reporting a problem through the app without any resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Great crockpot
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite crockpot! I loved that you could control it by Bluetooth. But for some reason after I upgraded my phone the app wouldn’t connect. The crockpot still works great but that was the main reason for paying a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most recipes are too short for a typical work day for us so this has been a great addition to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Three stars for the trial and error getting it to work initially. But after some googling and perseverance we are enjoying our crockpot dinners started from work. Most recipes are too short for a typical work day for us so this has been a great addition to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this because it has caused my husband to start ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it has caused my husband to start cooking. He found this technology to be so interesting that it raised his interest in cooking. I've had no problems with the app. I like that I have control over the cooking process and can change the crockpot settings while I am at work if I start to second guess my decisions.
customer_reviews.author: ebilbo

customer_reviews.title: A TECHIES ANSWER TO COOKWARE
customer_reviews.text: This is cat's meow of crockpots. I prepared a huge brisket that was set to finish at 4:30pm that afternoon, but I was delayed at work. I logged onto the crockpot with my Android phone from work and turned down the temperature so I wouldn't overcook it. Nothing better than walking in the door at home and smelling a crockpot that's been brewing up dinner all day long. Brisket turned out FABulous.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. It’s just a regular crock pot.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty tech savvy and I could never get the WiFi to work. Tried the reset button and then it literally got stuck inside...so now I just have a regular crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: Christen Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Had to Return First One
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for her birthday. She was simply thrilled. However, after using it twice, it quit working. She went through somewhat of an ordeal getting it replaced, but finally got a new one. Had to ship the old one back. She's happy with it now, but things should have been easier.
customer_reviews.author: ALKinPHX

customer_reviews.title: A working paren'ts best friend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for working parents! We all know that leaving your crockpot cooking all day while you're at work will leave you with overcooked food. However, being able to start the crockpot in the middle of my workday and come home to a cooked meal is FANTASTIC!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: WIFI CONNECTION DOES NOT WORK AFTER 20 TRIES AND MULTIPLE FIXES
customer_reviews.text: WIFI connection DOES NOT WORK and I have done the reset, reboot, try again 25 times. Aggravation galore. If you want to use the unit manually it is ON OFF only. Folks - for $85 you cannot set the unit manually for 4 or 8 hours like every other crockpot on the planet. I was excited about this technology and it is a FARCE. Read the 100s of reviews that disclose it cannot connect or it disconects. THE WIFI COMPONENT IS DEFECTIVE AND THE PRODUCT IS A NIGHTMARE TO RETURN. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Unit worked great through my Wemo app
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked great through my Wemo app. Now I can set the unit to warm if I'm going to be late coming home. Like all Wemo devices it did require a firmware update, but that only took a few minutes. The controls on the font are easy to use if you don't want to use the app.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love being able to check on our meals while at work. If we start them in the morning when we leave they over cook. We just need to set a reminder to use the app and turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: JP Clark

customer_reviews.title: No longer works with WiFi.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working with WiFi after the update. Now it's just like a ordinary crockpot. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: BeCa

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: we use this pretty often. never had any trouble setting or changing settings via iPhone. It's nice to not worry if both of us are working late, that whatever is in the cooker won't dry out, score or char. either myself or my spouse can turn it to warm of turn it off. Great piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: EdG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love all my Wemo products. This has made using the crockpot while at work very convenient. Dinner is always ready by the time I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my crazy work schedule
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can turn the crockpot on remotely from my phone! No more super over cooked crockpot meals. Everything comes out perfectly timed! Truly a dinner time game changer for my crazy work schedule!
customer_reviews.author: J. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Best Slow Cooker Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally a game changer! Being able to change setting via your smartphone is such a quality of life thing. You'll wonder how you managed to use a slow cooker before getting this one. Also fits the typical sized slow cooker bags if you're feeling lazy and don't want to clean up after!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The crock pot works just fine, but I've had a lot of trouble with ...
customer_reviews.text: The crock pot works just fine, but I've had a lot of trouble with the more advanced functions, and setting up the wifi was a total pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Tardis

customer_reviews.title: This thing is cool! What's to say
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cool! What's to say? It's a crock pot you control from your phone! I turn it on from work or wherever. Not hard to hook up. After that it seems to stay programmed even after you unplug it. I've used probably 8 times so far. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie F. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Product OK, Connectivity Difficult
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell, the appliance itself is just fine. My problem is with the connectivity. It's difficult to set-up and easy to lose the connection. Right now I am sitting directly next to the Crock-Pot with the unit plugged in and WiFi light blinking, and my phone is telling me the WeMo SlowCooker network is not in range. The app is telling me there is no remote connection, but is not very helpful on how to fix that. I'm sure most of these issues are problems with my phone or WiFi network, but this device is not as easy to connect as a few other devices I have.
customer_reviews.author: Baseballman86

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one sent to me and after two hours of tec support it will not link to my wi-fl.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: What a concept. Works as promised. Allows you to prepare dinner the night before. Place crock in the refrigerator and place in cooker in the morning. Start the pot anytime during the day and dinner is ready when you get home. Love the features
customer_reviews.author: mspat

customer_reviews.title: Works great, bought it as a gift for some else ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, bought it as a gift for some else but it was too heavy for them. I've been using it for almost a year with no problems. Cooking lamb now in it for dinner.

customer_reviews.title: App is a little slow in refreshing.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Only complaint I have is when using the app, sometimes it takes 4-5 minutes to refresh, or you have to close the app and come back in. Otherwise works great as a slow cooker. Definitely is convenient to be able to change settings on the fly even while out and about. I would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend thinks I'm the bomb dot com for buying her this thing. Hooks up to wifi just as described. Super easy to control via iphone. You can control it with the push buttons but WHY?!?!? Just be cool and hit the button on your phone from the office instead. House smells so good when you get home too :-)

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.

customer_reviews.text: Love this for multiple reasons. Phone app is great, Warner doesn’t “over cook” food. Easy clean up. Definitely recommend this. We use it several times a week and great for pre-made meals.

customer_reviews.text: The boys and I got it for mother's day gift. Big hit, she loves the control from anywhere and uses it more than the old one. The perfect gift for every mom.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: After following the instructions that came with the device on how to connect it to my wifi, it was very easy to set up. I've used it several times and only noticed one small glitch with the app: the app may say that your device is off when it isn't; just cycle through the heat options on the app and it'll be fine... even though it already was... just didn't appear so in the app.
customer_reviews.author: The StasTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.text: I used this crockpot exactly twice. Now it will not turn on.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is not easy to use. I’m very disappointed with this crockpot.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the behest of a few people and since receiving it, I have sold off my other crock pots!!! I'm away from home 11 hours a day and I will no longer have dry food when I get home!!! Love, love, LOVE this crock pot!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Melerski

customer_reviews.title: Great new toy.
customer_reviews.text: We love this new wifi crockpot. We have used it 4 times. The ability to increase or decrease the completion time remotely is awesome for a person with a busy lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a great idea if it worked
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a great idea if it worked... It connected the first time I used it, until it lost connection a couple of hours into cooking. Since then it will not connect at all. I've spent hours troubleshooting, and going through all of the forum tips and no luck. Now I'm stuck with a mediocre crock-pot that I paid twice as much as a comparable product.
customer_reviews.author: M. weed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great as advertised! BOUGHT it so I could start my cooking while at work. PERFECT. A+
customer_reviews.author: RA Drummond

customer_reviews.title: The crockpot works fine, but the Wemo app is useless
customer_reviews.text: The WEMO quit working and they do not have customer service. When I finally did get someone with the Wemo company by phone, I was told someone would call me back in 45 minutes and no one ever did. The crockpot works fine, but the Wemo app is useless. I paid $125.99 for this and I feel completely ripped off. I work ALOT and this wemo feature is something that was really needed for my busy lifestyle. Save your money and just get a really good crockpot.
customer_reviews.author: Divagirl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The slow cooker itself is great, but the app is terrible.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Set up in 2 minutes. Good looking and works well. Unsure of the wifi struggles others mentioned. Seemed easy to me.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas last year and she loves it! She can control it from anywhere with the app. She's never had any issues with it not turning on or any changes she makes while using the app. She definitely recommends this to anyone who likes crockpot cooking and wanting a way to control when it goes on or off. She also said that the food comes out perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: MomMom

customer_reviews.title: WeMo sucks ass
customer_reviews.text: The WeMo app sucks. I fought the app for 3 hours and then went to bed. Woke up. Tried it again while calling tech support and it worked before the tech lady had the slow cooker manual up on her screen. But it’s all working as advertised now. Update This crockpot is amazing. I work away from home and have pre made homemade frozen dinners that I can put in the crockpot before I go to work. Then during my shift, if I have cell service, I can have a hot meal ready when I walk through the door. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Supper trooper pooper

customer_reviews.title: No more over cooked meals! Woot! Woot!
customer_reviews.text: I tried my crock pot the other day for the first time. It linked right up and stayed linked. I put a roast in and left for the day. I adjusted the temp during the day and it worked great. I came home to a wonderful smelling house and a perfectly cooked roast. I am in love with this crock pot. No more over cooked meals for this working family.
customer_reviews.author: Robynhood

customer_reviews.title: I like the feature of controlling the crock pot via app
customer_reviews.text: I like the feature of controlling the crock pot via app, however upon first usage the crock pot is hot to the touch when on High - my husband burned his hand.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered the wemo crockpot and I was sent the classic crockpot instead. I made a claim and they sent me a new one over night and I was sent the correct product. I used it today and it worked great. It was nice to be able to control the time and settings remotely. It was fairly easy to set up took a little longer than normal because of a firmware update, but once it was as completed it synced right away.
customer_reviews.author: Tandi

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the Wemo Smart Wifi-Enabled Crock-Pot to be used outside the US while ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Wemo Smart Wifi-Enabled Crock-Pot to be used outside the US while currently living/working abroad. Unfortunately, the crock-pot only runs on 110V. As a modern household device, the device should be able to run on 110V - 240V. Otherwise, shipping should be restricted to countries with 110V only. Item was shipped to South Africa, where it can only be used with a step-down transformer.
customer_reviews.author: Hardy G.

customer_reviews.text: This crock pot is worth the money! No more overcooked meals. Programming with my phone is very easy.

customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great crock pot; WeMo app needs more development
customer_reviews.text: I love crock pots for the convenience and how the meals always come out tasting delicious. I've waited a long time to get my hands on a WeMo-enabled crock-pot. Wi-fi setup was mostly a breeze. The unit connected easily to my smartphone (Android) and the WeMo app. It also updated its firmware automatically. While I like the product, I am disappointed that there is no way to set a rule for a more complex cooking schedule. For example, I have a recipe that needs the crock-pot to cook for 1 hour on high followed by 3 hours on low. Right now, there is no way to set this up using the WeMo app.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Love wifi capability!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second crock pot I've ever owned. My last one ended up having the lid fall apart (much older brand). I LOVE this new crock pot. It's sleek looking, non-stick and fits a whole chicken. I love the wi-fi (phone app is called WEMO) capability and it is easy to use. I would recommend this to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: B. Herrin

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The smart crock pot is the best thing anyone could have.I absolutely love it.I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 days before Christmas and came before we gave gifts, great working product and beautiful at that!

customer_reviews.text: I love this crock pot with remote control from my i phone! Fantastic!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far, the Crock-Pot works great! It connects easily with our wifi, and responds instantly with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Eastep

product_meta.title: Crock-Pot 6-Quart WeMo-Enabled Smart Slow Cooker, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The Crock-Pot Smart Slow Cooker enabled with WeMo is everything that you love about Crock-Pot Slow-Cookers taken to the next level. If you have been looking for a great reason to get a new Crock-Pot Slow-Cooker-this is it! This Slow-Cooker features a roomy 6-quart capacity that accommodates large families or dinner parties, It has an oval shape that fits roasts and large cuts of meat, and the glass lid helps trap in heat and moisture. Once cooled, the Slow-Cooker cleans up easily. Wipe down the heating base's exterior with a damp cloth and place the removable stoneware and glass lid in the dishwasher. Remote access to all cooking functions- Adjust cooking time, temperature, shift to warm or turn off from your smart device Connect from anywhere with 3G / 4G / Wi-Fi Easy set up and easy to use Free WeMo App available for Apple and Android devices Handy cord storage Roomy 6-quart capacity Can be used with or without the app-Control cooking functions using smart device or manual operation directly on unit Dishwasher-safe stoneware and glass lid Cool-touch handles Additional Info With the Crock-Pot Smart Slow Cooker enabled with WeMo you get brand new benefits that enhance your slow cooker experience. It lets you connect and cook with the flexibility to change settings to meet your schedule. Using the FREE WeMo App, this smart Slow-Cooker adjusts temperature, cook time and more all from your smart device. Simply sync your slow cooker to the FREE app and you have access at your fingertips. The app provides options to monitor remaining cooking time, change your cooking temperature, adjust cook time up or down, shift to WARM setting and turn off. You have the assurance that, no matter where you are, you have dinner under control. Have you ever been held up somewhere wishing you could just get home to finish your slow-cooked dinner? Wouldn't it be nice if you could control your Crock-Pot from where ever you
feature_bullets: Crock-Pot and Belkin, the innovator of WeMo, bring you a state-of-the-art slow cooker that's designed to provide remote access to your home appliances
Adjust cooking time, temperature, shift to warm, or turn appliance on and off using the WeMo App from your smart device, or directly on the unit
High and Low temperature settings, with Warm feature
This appliance does not need to be connected to Wi-Fi in order to be used. Wi-Fi connection is necessary only when controlling appliance remotely
Free WeMo app available for Apple (iOS 7 and higher) and Android (4.0 and higher) devices
